name: Keep It Going
description:
Press the corresponding key as the wave passes into a new stand of people. You may also click on balls for extra score. You can mute / change the volume in the settings.

Check out the mobile version on Google Play! That version has achievements and leaderboards!

This game is a much improved version of my ludum dare 46 submission -> Keep It Going. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/keep-it-going
